comments.raw_text:
Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:6.0a2) Gecko/20110606 Firefox/6.0a2

By pressing the "Change" button in the about page in order to select another branch, but not making any change whatsoever, restarts the download.

Reproducible: always

Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to Help-> About (Mac: Aurora->About)
2. Select Change button and switch to Beta
3. Press Apply and update
4. Wait for download to finish
5. Select Change button again but leave option to Beta
6. Press Apply and Update

Actual results:
 - the download restarts from zero, although changes weren't made

Expected results:
 - download does not restart
comments.author: george.carstoiu@gmail.com

comments.raw_text: The channel switcher was removed in bug 659972, so this won't be a problem anymore once Aurora gets an update.
